items.title: American Express (NYSE:AXP) Faces Shareholder Proposals On DEI And Civil Liberties
items.description: American Express (NYSE:AXP) experienced a price move of 2.77% down last week, potentially influenced by a series of shareholder proposals focused on Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion, discrimination risks, and civil liberties in advertising. These proposals, which the company advised voting against, surfaced amid a broader market decline, with major indexes like the Dow Jones dropping 3.1% and the Nasdaq 2.4% due to economic concerns, such as tariff impacts and rising inflation fears. The...
